######################
uq4cgDNA Documentation
######################

Welcome to the documentation of *uq4cgDNA*, an uncertainty quantification
framework for the *cgDNA* model. For a short introduction including installation
instructions, please refer to the :doc:`getting_started` section. For more
details regarding the underlying theory of the package, have a look at the 
:doc:`theory`. The :doc:`tutorial` provides an example of how to use
uq4cgDNA. Lastly, the :doc:`api` sectioncontains the documentation of the source
code.
